m_szDocTitle: Audi To Focus On Electric And Fuel Cell E-Tron Vehicles
m_szDocSumamry: Audi To Focus On Electric And Fuel Cell E-Tron Vehicles | Posted by Filed under Audi Audi Q6 Electric Vehicles Fuel Cell Reports In the gruesome aftermath caused by the emission scandal, Audi allegedly channel decided to allocate all its financial and engineering resources in bringing alternative fuel-powered cars to the market as soon as possible. In fact, the German car manufacturer just announced its intentions to bring the all new, all electric Q6 SUV to life in 2018, as Car and Driver reports that all other “non-core” car projects have been put on hold because Audi doesn’t have the resour
